Class ImageWriter

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.writers.ImageWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageWriterJPG, ImageWriterPNG, ImageWriterSVG
public abstract class ImageWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Writes the map to an image.

isValidFileFormat

public boolean isValidFileFormat(java.lang.String fileFormat)
Determines if this ImageWriter accepts the passed file format.

Parameters:
fileFormat - The file format to check for acceptance.
Returns:
True if this ImageWriter accepts the passed file format, false otherwise.

getAcceptedImageFormats

public abstract java.lang.String[] getAcceptedImageFormats()
Gets the image formats accepted by this ImageWriter.

Returns:
A String array containing the accepted image formats.
